posts.post_content:

also looking for upgrades for cycle 460, tolstoi, Sov, Old Mill, EPDG, American Beauty... any of these VG-EX or better .. i would be interested in...

Jamie, do you mean Red-Hindu? I dont think your going to find brown as it's not been confirmed to date etc...
no card exist with both brown and red Hindu-one or the other...
yes sorry I meant red hindu seymour throwing.. although I have never seena pic of one or heard of anyone who has.. :(
